title: Онлайф
overview: Continuation of the dramedy "Instalife" - the Moscow version of "Sex and the City" in the era of social networks. Five friends still follow each other's lives on the social network, post staged photos and try to hide their problems from subscribers. But now they want to change their lives for the better, so they agree to participate in a psychological marathon, which should help them listen to their emotions and understand their desires. Can they find a balance between fiction and reality?
